sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "../styles/tour-details.css" import {Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from "reactstrap" import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from './../utils/avgRating' const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() const tour = tourData.find(tour=> tour.id === id) const {photo, title, desc, price,adress, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize} = tour const {totalRating, avgRating} = calculateAvgRating(reviews) return <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ( "Not reted" ): ( ({reviews.length}) )} {adress}
{city} {price}$ per person {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

{ /* ==== test reviews section ====*/ }

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
{/* ==== test reviews section end ====*/}
}; export default TourDetails;
